name: Greenlane Holdings, Inc.
description: Greenlane Holdings, Inc. is a leading global distributor of premium vaporization products and consumption accessories for both the cannabis and hemp industries. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, Greenlane offers a wide range of products, including vaporizers, storage containers, and other accessories that enhance the consumption experience. The company operates through a multi-channel distribution model, which includes direct-to-consumer sales, retail partnerships, and online platforms. Greenlane is committed to innovation and quality, continuously working to expand its product offerings to meet the growing demands of the cannabis market. By partnering with top brands and manufacturers, Greenlane ensures that its customers have access to the latest technology and trends in the industry. The company focuses on sustainability and responsible consumption, promoting products that align with these values. As the cannabis industry continues to evolve, Greenlane is well-positioned to lead in product development and market presence, aiming to provide consumers with safe and effective consumption solutions.

seo.meta_title: Greenlane Holdings, Inc. | Premium Vaporization Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Greenlane Holdings, Inc., a leader in the distribution of vaporization products and accessories for the cannabis industry. Discover our commitment to quality and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Greenlane specialize in?
faq.answer: Greenlane specializes in the distribution of premium vaporization products and accessories for the cannabis and hemp industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Greenlane?
faq.answer: Aaron LoCascio is the CEO of Greenlane Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Greenlane headquartered?
faq.answer: Greenlane is headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Greenlane offer?
faq.answer: Greenlane offers a variety of products, including vaporizers, storage containers, and other consumption accessories.
